title: The best headphones in the world are over $100 off at Amazon's Black Friday sales
author: nick-pino
summary: Snag a pair of Sony’s flagship noise-cancelling headphones for $100 / £100 off the MSRP
article: We haven't got enough praise for the Sony WH-1000XM4 wireless over-ear headphones, so much so that we named them best-in-class in our review, and still consider them to be the best headphones in the world.

That's why these Amazon Black Friday deals are so significant. As part of the retailer's Black Friday sales, you can grab a pair of Sony WH-1000XM4s at a steep discount, no matter whether you're in the US or the UK.

In the US, Amazon has discounted the WH-1000XM4s to just $248, down from the usual retail price of $349, a massive $101 saving. UK customers aren't left out in the cold, either, with an equally stellar discount. Over at Amazon UK, you can buy the WH-1000XM4s for just £245.
US buyers also have the option of shopping with Best Buy and Walmart, where the same $100 discount has been applied to Sony WH-1000XM4 stock there.

Considering that these cans scored incredibly well (we gave them a perfect 5 out of 5 no less) and often go for hundreds more, they’re definitely worth snagging if you’re in the market for some of the best noise-cancelling headphones.
(Not in the US or UK? Keep on scrolling to see the best deals in your region.)

So why do we consider the Sony WH-1000XM4 the absolute best headphones you can buy? Well, they’ve got a number of advantages over the competition, including premium noise cancellation, audio upscaling, support for Sony’s spatial audio format, best-in-class battery life and a fun, lively sound quality that’s easy on the ears.
You’ll have to be careful with them as they’re known to be a bit fragile, but keep them in their case when you’re traveling and you shouldn’t have to worry about them.
